product_name: Stansport Peva Rain Poncho - Youths' - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Donned with a hood and side-snap closures, the Stansport Peva rain poncho stows conveniently in a purse or pack to help you keep the young ones dry at festivals and ball games.
short_description: Donned with a hood and side-snap closures, the Stansport Peva rain poncho stows conveniently in a purse or pack to help you keep the young ones dry at festivals and ball games.
